'''Project Malmö''' is a mod developed by Microsoft Research that allows players to view and edit the ''[[Minecraft: Java Edition]]'' code.<ref>https://web.archive.org/web/20180218210705/https://mojang.com/2016/07/project-malmo-uses-minecraft-to-make-ai-smarter/</ref>

== Additions ==

Project Malmö adds the ability to view and edit the ''Minecraft'' code. It uses ''Minecraft'' to experiment with AI. It can allow mobs to craft, build, and do various other things.

== Setup ==
=== Downloading ===

#Visit [https://github.com/microsoft/malmo here] or alternatively chose a different version [https://github.com/microsoft/malmo/releases here]
#Download

=== Running ===

{{Tabber
|tabname1=Windows
|tabcontent1=
#Type this in the Command Prompt while in the unzipped folder of Project Malmö:<syntaxhighlight lang="sh">cd minecraft
launchClient</syntaxhighlight>
#Launch an agent (for more information see [https://github.com/microsoft/malmo#launch-an-agent here]).
|tabname2=macOS and Linux
|tabcontent2=
#Type this in the terminal while in the unzipped folder of Project Malmö:<syntaxhighlight lang="sh">cd minecraft && ./launchClient.sh</syntaxhighlight> or, <syntaxhighlight lang="sh">cd minecraft
./launchClient.sh</syntaxhighlight>
#Launch an agent (for more information see [https://github.com/microsoft/malmo#launch-an-agent here]).
}}
